name: The Lying King
description:
You play as a compulsive liar whose only goal is to get as many people to love him by any means through dialogue.

Listen carefully to what people say to you and decide what would be the best thing to say in response.

This game was made in 7 days for a community game jam hosted by Itch io. All the coding, art assets and audio was made completely from scratch! It has 886 recorded voice lines with over 10,000 individual words spoken!

We hope you enjoy our crazy and unique game experience, if you want to support the creators of this project, consider subscribing to VidovicArts on Youtube where awesome projects are made weekly!
